channel.title: Gaming on MegaSmidge
channel.description: Recent content in Gaming on MegaSmidge

item.title: Setting Windows Aside
item.description: I’ve been a Windows user most of my 34 years on this earth. It was a matter of what my parents had in the house growing up in the 90s. As someone who got into videogames at a young age, Windows was the only way to go at the time. I wasn’t interested in building anything or being super technical, and it never even crossed my mind that I could be “good at computers” to pay the bills.
